style_property.title: Battle.net icon height
style_property.description: This refers to the height of the Battle.net icon. The Battle.net icon is an SVG, not a FontAwesome Icon, so the "Icon font size" property has no effect on the Battle.net icon.

style_property.title: Battle.net icon width
style_property.description: This refers to the width of the Battle.net icon. The Battle.net icon is an SVG, not a FontAwesome Icon, so the "Icon font size" property has no effect on the Battle.net icon.

style_property.title: Epic Games icon height
style_property.description: This refers to the height of the Epic Games icon. The Epic Games icon is an SVG, not a FontAwesome Icon, so the "Icon font size" property has no effect on the Epic Games icon.

style_property.title: Epic Games icon width
style_property.description: This refers to the width of the Epic Games icon. The Epic Games icon is an SVG, not a FontAwesome Icon, so the "Icon font size" property has no effect on the Epic Games icon.

style_property.title: Gamer card margin-top
style_property.description: This adjusts the margin-top property of the gamer card popup. You may have to adjust this depending on how you decide to style the icons in the postbit.

style_property.title: Icons container
style_property.description: Affects all icons regardless of placement

style_property.title: Member tooltip container
style_property.description: Only affects icons in the member tooltip container

style_property.title: Message user info container
style_property.description: Only affects icons in the message user info

style_property.title: Status
style_property.description: The elements selected here will be displayed in the message user info and member tooltip.

style_property.title: Display gamer profiles in member tooltip
